EmailTemplate.description: Automatic email sent to system admin when a new student is created and the 'Student Renumbering Exception' field is checked by the before insert trigger (e.g. when twins are inserted and the logic doesn't know which student number to update as they both match)
EmailTemplate.name: Sys/Adm - New Student Renumbering Exception Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: New Student Created with Student Renumbering Exception
